definition: The term refers to the measurement or quantification of the amount of electric energy consumed by a device, system, or entity over a specific period of time. It is commonly used in discussions related to energy efficiency, sustainability, and electricity consumption analysis.

examples.german: Der Stromverbrauch ist in den letzten Jahren gestiegen.
examples.english: Electricity consumption has increased in recent years.

examples.german: Der hohe Stromverbrauch führt zu steigenden Energiekosten.
examples.english: High electricity consumption leads to rising energy costs.

examples.german: Es ist wichtig, den Stromverbrauch zu reduzieren, um die Umwelt zu schonen.
examples.english: It is important to reduce electricity consumption in order to protect the environment.

examples.german: Der durchschnittliche Stromverbrauch pro Haushalt liegt bei 3000 Kilowattstunden pro Jahr.
examples.english: The average electricity consumption per household is 3000 kilowatt hours per year.

examples.german: Der Stromverbrauch kann durch den Einsatz energieeffizienter Geräte gesenkt werden.
examples.english: Electricity consumption can be reduced by using energy-efficient devices.
